mapper.select: SELECT ca.`code`, ca.`name`, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT template_id) FROM coupon_activity_detail WHERE coupon_activity_id = ca.id ) AS citeNum, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT store_id) FROM coupon_activity_detail WHERE coupon_activity_id = ca.id ) AS storeNum, ca.coupon_num_type, ca.coupon_num, ( SELECT count(cts.id) FROM coupon_activity_record car LEFT JOIN coupon_template_send cts ON cts.id = car.send_id WHERE cts.`status` IN ('1', '2', '4') AND car.coupon_activity_id = ca.id ) AS getNum, ( SELECT count(cts.id) FROM coupon_activity_record car LEFT JOIN coupon_template_send cts ON cts.id = car.send_id LEFT JOIN coupon_template_use ctu ON ctu.send_id = cts.id WHERE ctu.`status` = '1' AND cts.`status` IN ('1', '2', '4') AND car.coupon_activity_id = ca.id ) AS useNum, ( SELECT count(cts.id) FROM coupon_activity_record car LEFT JOIN coupon_template_send cts ON cts.id = car.send_id WHERE cts.`status` = '5' AND car.coupon_activity_id = ca.id ) AS revocationNum, ca.activity_start, ca.activity_end, ( SELECT cad.start_time FROM coupon_activity_detail cad WHERE cad.coupon_activity_id = ca.id ) AS coupon_start_time, ( SELECT cad.end_time FROM coupon_activity_detail cad WHERE cad.coupon_activity_id = ca.id ) AS coupon_end_time, ca.created_by_name, ca.created, ca.updated_by_name, ca.updated FROM coupon_activity ca LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_detail cad ON cad.coupon_activity_id = ca.id LEFT JOIN coupon_template ct ON ct.id = cad.template_id LEFT JOIN store_user_info sui ON sui.store_id = cad.customer_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ca.`status`='1' AND ca.`code` = '' AND ca.`name` = '' AND ct.`code` = '' AND sui.store_name = '' AND ca.coupon_num_type = '' AND ca.customer_voucher_limit_type = '' AND ca.created_by_name = '' AND ca.created < '' AND ca.created > ''
